QuestData.Title: Learn to Ride in Orgrimmar
QuestData.Description: This pamphlet advertising riding training and mount purchases was sent from Kildar.$B$BKildar can be found in Orgrimmar's Valley of Honor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the pamphlet to Kildar in Orgrimmar's Valley of Honor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, you received my letter? Good.
QuestData.RewardText: So, shall we begin your Apprentice Riding training?
